data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Yangjiang
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Yangjiang, Guangdong, China

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Yangjiang, Guangdong, China that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Yangjiang, Guangdong, China to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who are far from you in Yangjiang. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Zhuang, Lianshan people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Zhuang, Lianshan people know you.
Over 90.8 percent of the people of Yangjiang are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the county of Yangjiang, Guangdong, China.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the county of Yangjiang, Guangdong, China has a population of 746,000.

We estimate Yangjiang has 56,592 people who might know Jesus, 12,052 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 677,356 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 56,592 believers in Yangjiang against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
